broadwick.stochastic

Class TransitionKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.stochastic.TransitionKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class TransitionKernel
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Class that holds the transition kernel for a stochastic simulation. The kernel comprises of a map of SimulationEvents to the probability of that event occurring. This is NOT thread safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Map<SimulationEvent,Double> kernel 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransitionKernel()
      Create a transition kernel object to hold the transition probabilities between vents.

        public final void addToKernel(SimulationEvent event,
               Double rate)
        Add the transition rate for a given event.
        Parameters:

        rate - the rate at which this event occurs.

        public final void clear()
        Clear all the events from the kernel.

      • getTransitionEvents

        public final Set<SimulationEvent> getTransitionEvents()
        Get the collection of events stored in the transition kernel. This actually returns the keyset from the transition rates since they are always present and will always be in the kernel.
        Returns:
        the events in the kernel.
